short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exports Facebook post's comments in bulk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Note: this extension is not officially developed by Facebook, The author is @William Chen.

Got feedback or experiencing any issues? Let us know on Facebook! Your input is important to us and we're here to help.
https://www.facebook.com/esuitdev

Export Comments for Facebookâ„¢, a powerful browser extension that is completely free. Whether you're a social media marketer, data analyst, or an everyday user, it will greatly assist you.

This extension's primary function is to effortlessly export comments from Facebook articles into JSON or CSV file formats. No more copy-pasting or manually organizing comments - with just a few clicks, the exported data will be neatly stored on your computer.

Export Comments for Facebookâ„¢ provides a user-friendly interface, making the process incredibly simple. Whether you're analyzing user feedback, exploring trends in opinions, or preparing comprehensive data reports, this extension efficiently caters to your needs.

Our extension not only saves you time but also ensures data accuracy. Each comment includes key information such as the commenter's name, timestamp, and number of likes. Whether you're an individual user or a professional, these insights can provide deeper analytical understanding.

The design of Export Comments for Facebookâ„¢ prioritizes privacy and security. We strictly adhere to Facebook's comment data privacy policies, ensuring that no information is leaked or misused when processing exported data.

Download and try Export Comments for Facebookâ„¢ now to experience the convenience and efficiency of comment exporting. Whether you're showcasing personal insights, evaluating market feedback, or sharing comments with your team, this extension will become your invaluable assistant.


Disclaimer: Please note this extension is NOT made by Facebook and is made by an independent development team. All copyrights belong to their respective owners.
Facebook doesnâ€™t endorse or sponsor this extension.
